review: The Graphtech Guitar Top Nut (PT-7004-00) is an excellent addition to any guitarist's setup. The TUSQ XL material significantly improves tuning stability and enhances the overall tone and sustain of my guitar. The self-lubricating properties ensure smooth string movement, which is crucial for maintaining tuning during performances. The nut is also visually appealing, matching well with my guitar's aesthetics. The installation process was straightforward, and the price is very reasonable for such a high-quality component. Highly recommended for anyone looking to upgrade their guitar's performance.
